description: Chlorophyll concentration imagery from MODIS-Aqua satellite measurements of global ocean color data. MODIS provides the ability to measure chlorophyll fluorescence, which gives insight into the health of phytoplankton in the ocean to help determine the cause of phytoplankton bloom collapses and help to make more robust estimates of primary productivity on a global scale.
keywords: Atlas, BCLME, OCEANS | OCEAN OPTICS | OCEAN COLOR, OCEANS | OCEAN CHEMISTRY | PIGMENTS | CHLOROPHYLL
name: BCLME: Chlorophyll / Primary production
